title: Coronavirus: Hospitals urged to use lab space to test NHS staff
description: The advice comes as the government faces growing criticism over a lack of testing for frontline staff.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Hospitals should use spare laboratory space to test NHS staff in England for coronavirus who are self isolating, Health Secretary Matt Hancock has said.
